description: Anchor yourself in easily, quickly and securely at the top of a sport climb. This single-position lanyard has an adjustable arm that unlocks with a simple turn. Includes a rubber ring to keep your locking carabiner in position for quick anchor clips.Dynamic lanyard rope reduces force if you happen to slip or fall while anchored.Lanyard adjustable from 15 to 95cm.Ascender unlocks with simple one-handed turn.Use with locking carabiner.Secures to harness tie-in points with girth hitch.
name: Petzl Connect Adjust Lanyard
